name: Chocolate Mint DeviantART (Minimalist)
description:
A simple, chocolate & mint-colored DeviantART style.

If you find any issues, or if you have suggestions or requests, let me know and I'll try my best to fix it, (hopefully in a timely manner).
additional_info:
v1.2b - (March.29.2016)
Updates and fixes:
- Cleaned up code and added notations to make future updates and revision easier as well as readability
- Modified "CORE" button on topmost header to better match the modified style
- Most dropdown menus (especially in the top header) are now correctly styled
- Borders around thumbnails are now correctly sized across the site
- Text on profile pages are all correctly styled (with the exception of the subtext under users names and the text near the badges)
- Rounded "Submit" button; may be reverted later or may have options added to customize

Known bugs:
- Buttons on profile pages are still using default style
- Many pages still need a lot of work
- Font color on overhead may be incorrect; it's intended to be white

v1.2 - {March.26.2016}
Updates and fixes:
- Updated style to comply with DeviantART layout V7
- New minimalist, flat design
- Top header bar no longer scrolls with page
- Further customized profile pages (Still needs some work, specifically when viewing profiles of other users - I'll update it shortly)

Known bugs:
- Borders around some images are the incorrect size
- Certain dropdown menus have not been altered yet and retain default colors
- Certain text and buttons when viewing profiles of other users are not correctly colored

v1.1 - {August.13.2013}
- Added borders around images and thumbnails.
- Changed color of Beta and New buttons on the left-side bar on the main page.
- Added version number to comment at the top of the code. This will make it easy to see if you have the most up-to-date version.

v1.0 - {August.12.2013} 
- Initial release
